<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105829</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105829</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205389</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">All in the Family: Gypsy Snider</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alle in der Familie: Zigeunersnider</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tous dans la famille : Snider Gitan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tudo na família: Snider Aciganado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tutti nella famiglia: Snider Zingaresco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλοι στην οικογένεια: Τσιγγάνος Snider</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Todos en la familia: Snider Gitano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Veteran circus artist Gypsy Snider launches a circus of her own, Les Sept Doigts de la Main, and brings her two-year-old daughter along with her. This Educator Guide traces the history of the circus and acrobatic performance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">VeteranZirkuskünstler Zigeunersnider stößt 
einen Zirkus von ihren Selbst-, von Les Sept. Doigts de la 
Main aus und holt ihre zwei-Jahr-alte Tochter zusammen mit ihr. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung vollzieht die Geschichte des 
Zirkusses und der akrobatischen Leistung nach.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'artiste Snider gitan de cirque de vétéran 
lance un cirque de ses propres, septembre Doigts de la Main de Les, et
apporte sa deux-année-vieille fille avec elle. Ce guide 
d'éducateur trace l'histoire du cirque et de l'exécution 
acrobatique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O artista Snider aciganado do circus do veteran 
lança um circus de seus próprios, Sept Doigts de la Principal de 
Les, e traz sua filha dois-ano-velha junto com ela. Esta guia do
educador segue o history do circus e do desempenho acrobatic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'artista Snider zingaresco del circus del 
veterano lancia un circus di suoi propri, settembre Doigts de la Main 
di Les e porta la sua due-anno-vecchia figlia con lei. Questa 
guida dell'educatore segue la storia del circus e delle prestazioni 
acrobatic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο τσιγγάνος Snider καλλιτεχνών τσίρκων παλαιμάχων 
προωθεί ένα τσίρκο της δικοί, Les του Σεπτεμβρίου Doigts 
de Λα Main, και φέρνει την δύο-χρονών κόρη της μαζί
με την. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών επισημαίνει την 
ιστορία του τσίρκου και της ακροβατικής απόδοσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El artista Snider gitano del circo del veterano 
lanza un circo de sus el propios, sept. Doigts de la Main de Les, y 
trae a su dos-año-vieja hija junto con ella. Esta guía del 
educador rastrea la historia del circo y del funcionamiento acrobacia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205389</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105829</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/all-in-the-family-gypsy-snider</uri>

  </manifestation>
